title: [K-12] Workshop on Teaching Methods Using Electrochemistry Basics and Green Experiment Kits

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of high school-level foundational chemistry concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education for preservice teachers, focusing on the use of eco-friendly experiment kits immediately applicable in educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core electrochemistry concepts (oxidation-reduction reactions, electrodes, potential differences, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design and execute three or more electrochemistry experiments using the Lectrofun 2.0 lab kit.
Learners can propose two or more instructional strategies for effectively teaching electrochemistry based on experimental results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
